attributes.background: He has lied and exaggerated to the media, including his employer the BBC, the extent of wildlife crimes, trying to show that they are extensive and that shooting sports should be banned. In both campaigns, he ignores the conservation benefits of shooting.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/having-honours-taken-away-forfeiture
